node.detail_zh: 患者居於沙田廣林苑茂林閣，因為她曾接觸東莞確診男患者被視為密切接觸者，被送往檢疫中心。她乘搭 CX320 航班來往西班牙馬德里，同機其中 1 名乘客也在中國確診。她上周曾在當地停留， 6 日流鼻水， 9 日發冷， 10 日由檢疫中心轉送威院，現時情況穩定。 2 月 21 日曾到荷蘭阿姆斯特丹， 2 月 25 日返港。
node.detail_en: The patient lives in Shatin Mau Lam House Kwong Lam Court.  As she has been contacted with confirmed coronavirus patient in Dongguan, she was sent to quarantine centre.  She has been on the flight CX320 going to and from Madrid, Spain, during where one of the passengers are confirmed in China.  She has stayed in Madrid, had sneezing nose on Mar 6, chilled on Mar 9 and was sent to Prince of Wales Hospital on Mar 10.  She went to Amsterdam on Feb 21 and returned to Hong Kong on Feb 25.

node.location_en: Mau Lam House, Kwong Lam Court
node.remarks_zh: 同住的父母沒有出現病徵，將被安排接受檢疫
node.remarks_en: The patient lives with her parents, who are both asymptomatic and will be arranged for quarantine.

node.location_zh: 國泰航空 CX320 ( 經濟艙 )
node.location_en: Cathay Pacific flight CX320 (economy class cabin)
node.remarks_zh: 在國泰航空 CX320（經濟艙）執勤
node.remarks_en: Worked at  Cathay Pacific flight CX320 (economy class cabin)

node.remarks_zh: 由香港前往西班牙馬德里
node.remarks_en: From Hong Kong to Madrid, Spain

node.remarks_zh: 於 2 月 21 日至 24 日前往荷蘭阿姆斯特丹
node.remarks_en: Visited Amsterdam, Netherlands from Feb 21 to 24.

node.remarks_zh: 安排接受檢疫時發現發燒，隨即將其送往威爾斯親王醫院接受治療
node.remarks_en: When arranging quarantine on Mar 10, the patient was found to have fever and immediately sent to the Prince of Wales Hospital for treatment.
